name: Pomidori Dating Sim
description:
>>ПЕРЕВОД ИГРЫ НА Р*ССКИЙ ЗАПРЕЩЕН<<

Подяки/Credits:

Це – фангра, заснована на новелі “Your Turn to Die: Death game by majority” за авторством Nankidai (@nannkizum).   Ми не маємо жодного стосунку до автора і офіційної гри.

    This is a fangame based on the game "Your Turn to Die: Death game by majority", created by Nankidai (@nannkizum).

    All of the following is a pure work of fiction, completely unrelated to the main events of the said game.
    The game does not contain any heavy topics. All of the relations between the characters are purely headcanon. All of the romanceable tomatoes are adults.

"Pomidori" is a pun, in Ukrainian and other Slavic languages the word for tomato is "pomidor".

Скрипт і переклад/Script and translation: 

      sep (@wetmango69)
